website_summaries.verdict: The design on this sink provides a lovely way to upgrade the look and utility of your laundry room.
pros: This glossy white, preassembled utility sink comes ready to install with a faucet and cabinet
Includes extra storage in the cabinet underneath the sink
Sink gives cabinet extra stability in the way it fits
cons: The cabinet on this model is a bit flimsy and not entirely waterproof

customer_reviews.title: But it arrived in perfect condition with easy to assemble instructions followed by two ...
customer_reviews.text: I read all of the other reviews reviews and was somewhat hesitant to purchase this item. But it arrived in perfect condition with easy to assemble instructions followed by two emails from the company making sure I had a contact if there was anything wrong. All in all very happy and satisfied with the purchase and customer service.
customer_reviews.author: SRR

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice not sure about quality and longevity
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for o this item was cheap and is cheap. I realized this from some of the other review. It’s not a high use item in our house and I will be surprised if the faucet lasts a year. Very poorly packaged. Mine arrived damaged but luckily we could hid the damage so I didn’t have to return. On the positive side the sink is large and deep.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Lose that sinking feeling
customer_reviews.text: Checked all the 'big box' stores and found nothing as good as this nor as reasonably priced. The fact that faucet is included is great. Sturdy construction and nice deep sink.
customer_reviews.author: Curmudgeon

customer_reviews.title: Works for what I need it to
customer_reviews.text: I wanted an all-in-one piece - cabinet, faucet and sink. Bonus on the soap dispenser since I don't have any counter around it! Nice deep sink and tall faucet with pull out sprayer. Cabinet a bit on the cheap side, but for what I wanted it for, it's fine. This was installed in my mudroom today - will be used to wash dirty hands from yardwork, fill up the dog's water bowl, and clean grill grates. For the price, it will work just fine!
customer_reviews.author: RHunter

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice, easy assemble, but bad quality and value
customer_reviews.text: This cabinet has a good design and looks nice but it has poor quality. The assembly process of this cabinet was surprisingly quick and easy but the sides of the cabinet are very thin and feel like paper, the sink itself also has poor quality. For storage or light use, this is an acceptable cabinet. If you intend to use this cabinet for washing clothes on a regular basis then I would look elsewhere due to its poor quality. In conclusion, this cabinets look decent but the product images don’t convey its port quality, for $350, I wouldn’t recommend this cabinet to anyone due to its poor value.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Good Looking tub.
customer_reviews.text: I like the looks of the tub very much. The packaging wasn't the greatest....the feet and screws were just thrown in the bottom of the carton and base and one knob screw was missing. The flange seat is too large and dirt tends to get trapped around the drain. Also it would be better if the tub was pitched toward the drain because now a lot of water just sits in the tub. I am keeping it.
customer_reviews.author: Jan K

customer_reviews.title: On the flimsy side.
customer_reviews.text: This was installed in our laundry room bathroom and is the perfect size. The style is nice. However the sink material is very thin and when using the pull down sprayer with the faucet you have to hold firmly on to the faucet otherwise I worry the sink material may crack. Had I been home when the contractor got this out of the box and assembled it I would have stopped him and returned it.
customer_reviews.author: JuliaW

customer_reviews.title: Great looking utility sink/cabinet
customer_reviews.text: This arrived in a timely manner and it was well packaged to protect it. The cabinet is very attractive and the sink is deep - 13-1/2". It was easy for the plumber to install. If you have knowledge of plumbing, etc. (which I do not) I imagine it would be fairly straightforward to install yourself. The frosted "glass" in the front of the cabinet is not actually glass but it is a sturdy and good-looking plastic material. It should hold up well. Overall, I'm very pleased with this cabinet and thrilled I now have a utility sink in my laundry room!
customer_reviews.author: Mom of 2

customer_reviews.title: The cabinet is great; faucet is not
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet packaging was very solid, no issues with condition upon arrival. It does come with everything you'll need with the exception of some silicone and screws to mount the cabinet to the wall (which is totally understandable.) It is easy to assemble, level-out, and connect. My only beef is with the quality of the faucet. It is very cheap: The handles are wobbly, the neck is plastic and does not seat very tightly to the base. I suppose this should be expected since the entire group is not very expensive. Just be aware this portion will likely require replacement sooner than later. I am still impressed with the product for the overall cost.
customer_reviews.author: Theresa Smith

customer_reviews.title: The description says it is glossy white. NO it is a dingy off white!
customer_reviews.text: It looks terrible with a White washer and dryer. It is Dingy looking. Very Disappointing! Off White is Not Glossy White. The description is totally misleading!
customer_reviews.author: Frank R. Lima

customer_reviews.title: Arrived broken
customer_reviews.text: The look of the product is great, but it feels cheap and arrived damaged. This is very disappointing considering how expensive it was. The front door is completely broken and could not be repaired. We are unfortunately outside of the return window, so cannot get a refund or exchange the product. We didn’t open the product for our contractor to install it. Had to get a cheaper basin instead. Very frustrating.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Depends on What you want...
customer_reviews.text: I was mistaken in assuming the tub was enamel. You know what they say about assuming, makes an a** out of U and Me. In any event, the unit is adequate, but not as sturdy as I had envisioned. So I returned it. If, however, you are looking for a nice, BIG, PVC (?) tub, reasonable faucet included and melamine cabinet, then this is a good cabinet. Has good storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great sink
customer_reviews.text: Looks like photo. Aesthetically pleasing. Fantastic for laundry or shop sink. Easy install. Faucet works great, soap pump is not good at all. Only watered down liquid soap can get pumped out and it sticks also which requires jigging it to get it to work. I wouldn’t give my beautiful sink up so I bought a wall mount soap dispenser to replace the one it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Laura B

customer_reviews.title: Great for the price
customer_reviews.text: Everything was installed by an experienced plumber. Went very smoothly in about 40 minutes. Which the plastic tub was just one step thicker. But for the price and the very limited use, it’s great for the price
customer_reviews.author: Charles B

customer_reviews.title: Very Very Cheap Plastic
customer_reviews.text: Sink is made of the cheapest plastic available and is very fragile. If you plan on using this AS a true Utility sink...do not buy. If you plan to use this simply as a discharge sink for your washer it should be fine. Installed 3 months ago and the sink has cracked along the bottom.
customer_reviews.author: DOUGLAS S HEFFRON

customer_reviews.title: Sink Arrived Damaged
customer_reviews.text: Cracks in both sides of particle board of base. Sink handle plastic and broken in half. However The sink part itself is nice in that its deep and has pre-drilled holes.
customer_reviews.author: ten

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but when you operate the faucet it feels flimsy
customer_reviews.text: Installed in my laundry area. Looks great and the cabinet is good. The sink itself looks fine, but it could do with more rigidity in the space where the faucet is installed. Given the tall faucet, it exerts considerable leverage on the plastic to make it feel flimsy. Suggest a angled metal strip underneath, below the plastic. The back of this angled strip could be attached to the wall, thus better supporting the faucet and making for a more sturdy installation overall
customer_reviews.author: Ragvinder S. Rekhi

customer_reviews.title: Arrived damaged
customer_reviews.text: Beautiful cabinet, but had a crack in the finish, see pics. Box was not damaged. Decided to keep it, since installer had arrived on the job, but I'd like to have an adjustment to the price I paid, since cabinet was not perfect.
customer_reviews.author: Page Turner

customer_reviews.title: Nice sturdy cabinet and extra deep sink
customer_reviews.text: I found this product to be definitely worth the price when compared to other utility sink and cabinet combo's, and the tub is extra deep which will help when soaking clothes or even rinsing off boots. It was super easy to put together and looks even easier to install.
customer_reviews.author: Patrick

customer_reviews.title: defective faucet
customer_reviews.text: This vanity was installed in my garage. Took quite a bit to adapt the plumbing and when it finally was ready for the faucet to be installed and connected the faucet had a leak and was deemed by the plumber as unusable and defective. One of the reasons I bought the sink was because of the cool faucet. However in examining the product found it to be made cheaply and of poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: cheri kennedy

customer_reviews.title: There was a slight dent in the lower part of the right door.  It is hard to notice.
customer_reviews.text: We are happy with the product. I went together fairly easy. One of the plastic faucet stems was broken so I had to go to the hardware store to get a replacement. There was a slight dent in the bottom of the vanity door.
customer_reviews.author: Tom Brady

customer_reviews.title: Online Dimensions Not Accurate
customer_reviews.text: Product is an inch wider with sink bowl lip (25") than diagram shown online (24"). We were installing this in a laundry room with very tight specifications so the extra inch caused some problems. Also, sink cabinet arrived with dent in front door and crack in the upper door hinge area. Our contractor is going to try and patch these defects.
customer_reviews.author: SifterNifter

customer_reviews.title: A perfect utility sink!!!
customer_reviews.text: This is one terrific find on Amazon. It was easy to install and works flawlessly. The unit modernizes our laundry area. It is a handsome piece of furniture. The sink is quite deep which is an extra added touch. The faucet has a pullout mechanism which comes in so handy. The faucet itself is very well made and adds a modern touch to the cabinet. All in all a terrific unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Not what I expected.
customer_reviews.text: Product received was damaged in two places. Plastic door insert was very cheaply made. I did receive fast credit however UPS pickup was a nightmare.
customer_reviews.author: lori

customer_reviews.title: Quality offering from a quality company
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet and sink are just what I was looking for and exactly as described. They arrived well packaged and on time. Unfortunately, the faucet arrived broken. Their customer service department replied immediately after I contacted them and we more than helpful in providing an accommodating resolution.
customer_reviews.author: Brenda W.

customer_reviews.title: Great quality product and price too
customer_reviews.text: You need a plumber to install because of the sewer connection but the quality of the faucet, sink and cabinet are great. It would be great if they have an stainless steel option for the sink.
customer_reviews.author: Rocks are just hard as stones

customer_reviews.title: Poorly packed will arrive damaged
customer_reviews.text: Poorly packed and arrived damaged. Made from mdf too. Complete garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Alex

customer_reviews.title: A Great Utility Sink
customer_reviews.text: This sink is the perfect size for washing large items and small doggies. The best purchase I've made in a long time. It fits great in my small bathroom and looks great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: For the money it does the job
customer_reviews.text: The sink arrived damaged but the customer service was great! They quickly resolved the issue and I'm a happy customer with a sink that does the job :)
customer_reviews.author: Bob H.

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised that the doors were plastic. I must have confused it with another product. You get what you paid for. It will do, it it wasn’t cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Sara J Dutton

customer_reviews.title: Great utility sink!
customer_reviews.text: Great company to buy from. I had a slight problem with my first unit. Contacted them. They replied immediately. Highly recommend! Thanks!
customer_reviews.author: Mommer101

customer_reviews.title: It’s okay
customer_reviews.text: It looks nice. The faucets were pre assembled backwards so it was a challenge to reverse them. The water does not drain fully, I believe it’s a flawed design. There is always a puddle left in the sink. The drainer sits too high with no solution.
customer_reviews.author: Ann Vanzutphen

customer_reviews.title: Looks great
customer_reviews.text: I needed a tub in a hurry and I got it before it was scheduled to be here. I was very impressed. To be honest had a little nick in the back but no one would see it since in the back behind closed doors. I would recommend this it is very pretty exactly what I wanted.
customer_reviews.author: Lynne O

customer_reviews.title: Shipped broken
customer_reviews.text: Came broken. The piece was packed up splinter and then shipped. Should have not made it through quality control. Difficult and heavy to pack back up and take to ups location.
customer_reviews.author: jessica

customer_reviews.title: Looks nice but cheaply made
customer_reviews.text: Very flimsy and the faucet took some rework to keep it from leaking Looks nice but would not buy again
customer_reviews.author: corey

customer_reviews.title: Very nice assembly.
customer_reviews.text: My first impression is a very nice assembly and I like the smooth slick finish of the sink. I do have one suggestion, somehow figure a way to have more contour on the bottom so the water will run better toward the drain and not sit in the sink. I used a level to make sure the sink was sitting correct so not to puddle the water.
customer_reviews.author: Larry

customer_reviews.title: Ideal Features
customer_reviews.text: We liked the style and features of the cabinet. Perfect for a laundry sink, it is nice & deep, offers some storage below and high faucet to get large items into the sink to clean. Sink & cabinet arrived in good condition (no defects or damage).
customer_reviews.author: Arbos

customer_reviews.title: Excellent product
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace that cheap plastic sink most laundry rooms have. Although the sink is plastic it looks very nice, and is very study. We received many compliments
customer_reviews.author: Berton Reynolds

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy and great value
customer_reviews.text: The sink comes already assembled, you'll have to attach the base and install the drain and faucet. The material is made out of plastic so getting wet isn't an issue since it's a laundry tub. Overall great product.
customer_reviews.author: OliverTwist

customer_reviews.title: Not for tall people
customer_reviews.text: The unit is not as tall as the one we replaced but we are getting used to it. Definitely need a professional to do installation.
customer_reviews.author: crossgroves

customer_reviews.title: Great customer service and product!
customer_reviews.text: Replaced our existing unit with a better unit and it looks great. The support from Jackson was the best I've had and will definitely buy again from them.
customer_reviews.author: Cliff

customer_reviews.title: EXCELLENT COMPANY
customer_reviews.text: PRODUCT WAS VERY NICE, SINCE THE SINK WAS SO DEEP THE DRAIN WAS TO LOW FOR ME. EXCELLENT COMPANY TO DEAL WITH.
customer_reviews.author: tony cat

customer_reviews.title: Looks Great in our Laundry Room
customer_reviews.text: We replaced an old wooden vanity with this unit. The bright white matches the washer & dryer and brightens the whole room. It looks great and the tall faucet is a plus.
customer_reviews.author: Glenn R

customer_reviews.title: Easy to install and looks better than the old sink ...
customer_reviews.text: Easy to install and looks better than the old sink it replaced. Gives more of a finished look in our laundry room.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Quality
customer_reviews.text: Overall a good product. The sprayer is a little cheap but overall a good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Bert C.

customer_reviews.title: Great update to our laundry room
customer_reviews.text: Great tub, looks nice and clean. Makes the entire laudry room looks better.
customer_reviews.author: L. Hadley

customer_reviews.title: Great sink!
customer_reviews.text: Love this sink! It fit our space perfectly, the tub is a nice size and the faucet has regular/spray options, a very nice touch. Easy for our plumber to install.
customer_reviews.author: G. Fletcher

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful!
customer_reviews.text: after some original concerns I was pleased that Jackson Supplies LLC Agent out of their way to make my purchase perfect. Thank you for excellent customer service and for taking the time to help me get this great piece just right!
customer_reviews.author: Jennie Smith Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Good cabinet, fair faucet
customer_reviews.text: Cabinet is sturdy and functional. Faucet and nozzle are noticeably cheaper...will likely have to replace that piece in a year or so
customer_reviews.author: Alicia

customer_reviews.title: Don’t do it
customer_reviews.text: This product looks nice but flimsy facet and tub. Received damaged corner of cabinet broken. Would not recommend would never repurchase. Easy to install and assemble but not worth the money at all.
customer_reviews.author: Brody’s Mon

customer_reviews.title: nice looking but cheap product
customer_reviews.text: the product came chipped in 2 places also very plastic also very weak faucet
customer_reviews.author: jean almeida

customer_reviews.title: Awesome Product.
customer_reviews.text: Simply beautiful! The sink is deep and the doors are very good looking. The entire set, sink, cupboard and faucet is awesome.
customer_reviews.author: Goody

customer_reviews.title: It works and looks great
customer_reviews.text: It came in very nicely wrapped everything was as I hoped
customer_reviews.author: T  MAN

customer_reviews.title: I recommend highly
customer_reviews.text: Way good. Easy to wash dishes and small clothes. Easy to keep clean
customer_reviews.author: Joycesmith

customer_reviews.title: Not a good quality
customer_reviews.text: It is not a quality. Very inexpensive quality material, faucetter and sink very poor quality material. I doubt it will last long. Too much hassle to return due to size.
customer_reviews.author: Michael Ansari

customer_reviews.title: Sink is NOT white as stated and advertised
customer_reviews.text: Sink is not white and more of a yellowish white color. Put it right back in box to return only to be charged return shipping. DO NOT RECOMMEND product or service.
customer_reviews.author: Julie Cowan

customer_reviews.title: High quality for the price
customer_reviews.text: Instructions were clear. Parts were wonderful. Installation was a breeze. The included supply lines were short, but overall, this was a great buy.
customer_reviews.author: Paul Harper

customer_reviews.title: Very pretty
customer_reviews.text: Like this a lot. Had to put shims in the front so water would drain from sink. Had plumber connect as did not have sink previously. I had no problem putting it together
customer_reviews.author: Shirley Pye

customer_reviews.title: Very nice quality sink
customer_reviews.text: Sink is made of quality acrylic. Cabinet is sturdy and attractive
customer_reviews.author: Terry

customer_reviews.title: Good price, poor quality materials.
customer_reviews.text: Good for price but cheap materials used to build unit.
customer_reviews.author: Collin and LaRisa

customer_reviews.title: Great quality!
customer_reviews.text: Good quality cabinet. Sink is deeper than others that I looked at and great for my needs. Faucet is nice and I really like the adjustable sprayer.
customer_reviews.author: Susan Lavigne

customer_reviews.title: Quality product
customer_reviews.text: Love the design and overall quality. Minor issue about the misalignment of the two cabinet doors. They cannot be adjusted.
customer_reviews.author: Don H

customer_reviews.title: Impressed
customer_reviews.text: I looked for sometime to find a nice looking one in cabinet form. Very happy with this unit.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality
customer_reviews.text: The cabinet had damaged finish. The cabinet was too narrow for plumbing to work right. The faucet was very cheaply made.
customer_reviews.author: Sam A Martindale

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Doors are warped and do not meet evenly in the middle. For the price it is ok
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great tub and cabinet!
customer_reviews.text: Very easy to install the faucet seems to work very well!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Looks great. Easy to assemble and install
customer_reviews.text: Looks great. Easy to assemble and install. Just received this item so I have no comment re durability. Price is Right.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Goodman

customer_reviews.title: I believe the person who put the cabinet together was not careful
customer_reviews.text: I like how it looks and is really a good item, the only complaint is the broken corner it came with.
customer_reviews.author: Gloria montoya

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Nice looking. Cabinet came reassembled but plumbing took a little work.
customer_reviews.author: Don B.

customer_reviews.title: Similar to other reviews, this item arrived damaged. ...
customer_reviews.text: Similar to other reviews, this item arrived damaged. The particle board on left side of the cabinet was split. Unfortunately it wasn't recognized until half-way through instillation process.
customer_reviews.author: Robert Mercier Turner II

customer_reviews.title: a big drip
customer_reviews.text: The faucet is probably the cheapest piece of garbage I have ever seen. If your a light sleeper stay away from this cause you will hear drip drip drip drip drip drip drip drip, should I continue?
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

product_meta.title: LDR 7712CP-SD Laundry Utility Cabinet Sink Vanity Chrome Faucet with Pull Out Spray and Soap Dispenser
product_meta.description: Bring functional and sleek design into your laundry or utility room with the LDR utility sink and cabinet set. Heavy-duty faucet features a high arc design so you can fit all those bulky items, pull-down spout makes washing, soaking and filling pails easy. Change from a steady stream of water to a powerful spray with just one touch of a button. Spout is weighted to ensure it stays in place without sagging. Extra deep 13½-inch sink and built in washboard accommodate all your washing and scrubbing needs. Say goodbye to messy soap bottles- attached chrome soap dispenser does the job with elegance. The cabinet is perfect for hiding away all your detergents and other laundry accessories so the room stays neat. The glossy white finish and frosted door design add to the stylish finish. Slow close doors prevent slamming and prolong the life of the cabinet. Hardware is chrome to match the faucet. Pre-assembled base provides extra quality and stability. Solidly glued at the factory increases stability, and decreases time needed to assemble the unit. Sits on a 4.5-inch high wooden base. Includes everything you need to have the cabinet and sink set up in no time. Dimensions- Overall- 22”L 24.25”W X 32.75”H; Sink Dimensions- 22”L X 24.25”W X 13.5”D. 1-year limited warranty. Make it yours today!
feature_bullets: This cabinet and sink set combines everything you were looking for in a laundry tub vanity, plus all the extras that you weren’t even envisioning- think extra-deep sink basin, attached soap dispenser, built-in scrubbing board and elegant frosted glass- for a complete laundry room makeover. Quality built with both functionality and style in mind, this pre-assembled unit comes with all the plumbing parts (including supply lines) and hardware needed for a complete installation

The base of this vanity is preassembled at the factory. This highly increases stability, as well as decreases time needed to assemble the unit; cabinet is perfect for hiding away all your detergents and other laundry accessories, keeping the room neat. Glossy white finish and frosted door design adds a stylish touch; slow close doors prevent slamming to prolong cabinet life; cabinet hardware is chrome to match the faucet and to match any existing decor

Features: Extra-Deep Sink Basin accommodates all your washing needs; built-in scrubbing board for removing those stubborn stains; attached soap dispenser means no more messy spilling soap bottles; full-size 4.25” drain increases drain flow for efficient sink drainage and reduced blockages strainer can be used to stop the water from going down for soaking and will catch any degree when straining which can be easily discarded

Faucet is constructed with a metal base, handles, arch and even metal shanks for lasting quality. Extra High Arc design and weighted pull-out head makes washing, soaking, and filling pails easy; alternate between a steady stream and a powerful spray with just a touch of a button conveniently located on the spout

Set Includes Vanity, deep slop sink, stylish cabinet, Pull-Down Faucet, soap dispenser and plumbing installation parts; easy step-by-step illustrated instructions; 13.5” deep sink; Dimensions- Overall- 22”L 24.25”W X 32.75”H; Sink Dimensions- 22”L X 24.25”W X 13.5”D. Some assembly required; 1-year limited warranty.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.2 out of 5 stars136 ratings4.2 out of 5 stars
